name: FACIL _Demo
description:
Trapped in a seemingly infinite desert, with no end in sight, one's greatest ambition is simply to survive.

In the gaming world's newest installment of endless wonder and survival, explore vast desert wastelands and discover and experiment with all kinds of unique weapons, all while unravelling the bountiful mysteries and secrets that both comprise and envelope the ever-shifting deserts known as... FACIL!

\\Foreword\\

This piece of software is part of an In-Development Project and is not a clear representation of what the final project will be. Keep this in mind while playing through this Demo.
